direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods return type information related to the parameter, though getType() returns a more general Type.
Both methods retrieve information related to the parameter, but getValue() returns the transformed value.
Both methods access related components (ParameterType and Group) that are part of the Argument object.
Both methods involve transformations related to the parameter type, though transform() is more specific to the ParameterType.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of Argument objects with ParameterType and Group.
Initialization of ParameterType is required before accessing its properties.
Both methods verify and handle ParameterType properties, ensuring correct type and transformations.
